comment.author: 22081583@N06
comment._content:
Considering that the window is behind her this shot is very well lit.
If the image was taken in 1853, then this photograph may have been taken in Sketty Hall, Swansea, which was the Dillwyn's family home.

After setting her camera up for this photograph, she used it to take the photograph of John Dillwyn Llewelyn which also appears in this set (Ref. No. 3432433). Note the floral arrangement, the table, the book and the background are all the same.
